issue.title: [Java] Resolve problems of DecimalVector APIs on ArrowBufs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10294](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10294). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Unlike other fixed width vectors, DecimalVectors have some APIs that directly manipulate an ArrowBuf (e.g. \`void set(int index, int isSet, int start, ArrowBuf buffer)`).

After supporting 64-bit ArrowBufs, we need to adjust such APIs so that they work properly.
